name: Negotiations without Borders: a comedy evening game
name_original: Negotiations without Borders: a comedy evening game
description:
A Comedy Evening game for 3-6 players without a Story Guide

All the big space empires have come together for their annual attempt to resolve their differences peacefully. Inevitably, the outcome will be that anyone who actually wants a peaceful solution will be killed and something will be blown up.

A bonus comedy evening game for the One Page Jam 2021. You can also subscribe to my Patreon.
